Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded 30 points and 12 rebounds
Milwaukee Bucks rallied from a 19-point deficit
Bennedict Mathurin led the Pacers with 25 points
Gary Trent Jr. hit two clutch 3-pointers late in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Giannis Antetokounmpo stepped up in the second half after missing the previous three games
The Pacers' Damian Lillard had a forgettable first half with 3-for-14 shooting and two turnovers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Gainbridge Fieldhouse
Milwaukee Bucks hosted the game with a line of MIL -1.5
